alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Mercer; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:53AM EDT until April 01 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EDT FOR SHELBY...NORTHEASTERN DARKE...AUGLAIZE...EASTERN MERCER AND NORTHERN MIAMI COUNTIES... At 1252 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ottoville to near New Bremen, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Piqua, Greenville, Celina, Wapakoneta, St. Marys, Fort Shawnee, New Bremen, Minster, Versailles, Covington, Newport, Cridersville, Bradford, Anna, Fort Loramie, Jackson Center, Ansonia, Botkins and New Knoxville. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 82 and 118. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
